title: Tex Murphy 1 2 3 4 5 6
description:
Mean Streets 
Martian Memorandum
Under a Killing Moon
The Pandora Directive
OverSeer
Tesla Effect

first five are gog releases and run under windows 7
last one just out so there is no problem either
now about tricky part which is OverSeer, initially there were two versions of the game cd and dvd only difference between them is video quality in the cut scenes, the dvd is A LOT better but it rely on very specific software that windows 7 categorically refuse to accept (believe me i tried) which is probably why gog went with lower quality cd version, unlike them i could not make such choice so here it is both cd and dvd copies, if you have older windows you could try your luck with dvd version, personally i managed to make it work on windows xp 32 bit see Instructions.txt file inside

some files compressed with 7zip archiver if you do not have it run 7z.exe file
